title: Assessment of extracellular polymeric substances production and antioxidant defences in periphytic communities exposed to effluent contaminants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00446A, Paper
Carlos Silva, Etelvina Figueira, Diana Matos, Carina Sá, Tania Vidal, Fernando Gonçalves, Nelson Abrantes, Joana Pereira
Periphyton is frequently used in the evaluation of the ecological status of aquatic ecosystems using diatoms as proxy. However, periphyton has a particularity, the production of extracellular polymeric substances (EPS),...
